snippet.title: Bonnie Blob in Shapeville Trailer
snippet.description:
Bonnie Blob in Shapeville

An Adorable Interactive Storybook Adventure for Kids! 

Welcome to Shapeville, a colorful world filled with friendly shapes and endless fun! Meet Bonnie Blob, a bubbly little hero with a curious mind and a heart full of adventure. Along with her best friend Tiffany Triangle, Bonnie explores the whimsical corners of Shapeville, where every click brings something delightful to life!

📖Four Playful Adventures

This charming storybook game includes four interactive books, each with its own heartwarming tale:

- Bonnie’s Day Trip: Join Bonnie and her Mum on their day trip to see Tiffany Triangle!

- Bonnie’s Day at the Beach: Enjoy a sunny day full of sandcastles, meeting aquatic creatures, and beachy surprises!

- Bonnie’s Birthday: Help Bonnie celebrate her special day with friends, presents, and cake.

- The Quest for the Missing Puzzle Piece: Go on an adventure to find a lost puzzle piece with Bonnie and Tiffany’s help! 

🌈 Key Feature

- Engaging animations that bring the story and characters to life.

- Kid-friendly controls: just click and enjoy!

- Charming art and music that create a cozy, playful atmosphere.

- Ideal for parents and young children to enjoy together.

- Encourages exploration and curiosity through interactive scenes.
